divs: sighting detailsi was up for coffee and happend to look out our living room window and i saw a flasing light comming down from the south. it came to about 150ft away from my house and about 50-60ft above the water {we live on a lake}it came in fast but as it slowed down at that hight it slowed to a crawl of about 4-5mph. it had 3 lights on the bottom of it 2 on the outside were yellow\white and the one in the middle that was bigger was gold \white and blinked as i was watching it i saw the reflection of the main light on the waters surface nad i kinda got a little scared at that point it slowly went west untill out of viewat the same slow speed and height. it didnt make a sound at first i thought it was a helocopter but it didnt make a sound and at that distance i woulld have heard somthing. tonite im going to get my camera and see if it comes back. to me it seemed to be looking for somthig but who knows. tx for your service daniel paiement.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Kenora
There were no other sightings in Kenora on or around August 29th 2008
Summary: Well it came from the south down to about 50ft above our lake all can see was 3 lights 2 continuous the larger middle one flashing
